content.question: Which of the following best explains the expansion of participatory democracy in the early nineteenth century?

choices.label: The abolition of slavery in most northern states
The growth of manufacturing along rivers and canals
The extension of suffrage rights to most adult White men
The influence of the early womenâ€™s rights movement

content.answer: The extension of suffrage rights to most adult White men

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
